heisigStory: Let the drop in the upper right-hand corner of this character close the right angle off to make an arrowhead. Whenever we find the needle with that drop in an element that has no other special meaning, we will take advantage of this primitive meaning. At the bottom, we see the grains of rice, the vertical line doubling up for the two elements. Do not confuse with petition (Frame 143).
koohiiStory1: Enemy: "Any final requests?" // MacGyver: "Just an arrowhead and some grains of rice." (MacGyver then throws the grains of rice at the enemy and uses the arrowhead to cut his hands free from the rope.).
koohiiStory2: Robin Hood holds his rich victim at arrowpoint and kindly requests that he hands over his grains of rice.
myStory: chữ cầu. tìm, xin. lúa đội mũ đi xin.
words:
請求(せいきゅう): claim, demand, application, request
求める(もとめる): seek, request, demand, want, wish for, search for
要求(ようきゅう): request, demand, requisition
